title: Ticket #1465: SOAP_SSL_CA_DIR/FILE don't work in amazon_gahp
description: #795 included having the amazon_gahp recognize config params SOAP_SSL_CA_DIR and SOAP_SSL_CA_FILE for use in authenticating proxy http servers (and the actual server, as it turns out). However, it appears this never worked, as the amazon_gahp calls param(), but never reads the config file. These settings need to be passed into the gahp some other way.
remarks:
2010-Jun-17 13:49:02 by jfrey:
Pushed a fix to V7_4-branch for 7.4.4.
check_ins: 2010-Jun-17 13:48   Check-in [18493]: Fix SOAP_SSL_CA_DIR/FILE param for amazon_gahp. #1465 The config params SOAP_SSL_CA_DIR and SOAP_SSL_CA_FILE weren't being recognized by the amazon_gahp. It was trying to param() for them, but it hadn't read the config file. Now, the gridmanager checks for them and puts them in the environment of the [...] (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
